div.p: Sukkhifashion jewellery manufactures luxuriousjewellerywith high-end fashionable design which has elegance and style that adds radiance to the natural beauty of a woman. The brand emphasizes on delivering superior quality products and has crossed all the milestones in the world of designer jewelry . They believe in leading the market by setting a new trend and their commitment and dedication to the principles is the secret of their success., one of the leading online shopping portals, has interesting and admirable selectionfashion jewelleryon its website by Sukkhi. The exhaustive assortment consists of alluring pieces of jewellery like earrings, rings, pendant sets, necklaces, mangalsutra bangles, bracelets and chains. Good enough to be worn on multiple occasions like party, wedding, engagement, to work, office or during festive season, these jewellery pieces have been created with sparkling finish and the best craftsmanship. Be assured to find a variety of contemporary and traditional designs in the mesmerising collection that we offer.Buy fashion jewellery online from our website by Sukkhi at some extremely slashed down prices. You can grab some amazingcombo offerson these jewels and in return can save a lot of money on each piece that you purchase.

Keep jewellery away from direct heat, water, perfumes, deodorants and other strong chemicals as they may react with the metal or plating. The plating composition of Jewellery is as such that perspiration (sweat) will not damage it. Wipe Jewellery gently with chamois cloth or leather swatch after every use. Wiping the jewelry with a soft cloth after removing the jewellery would add to its life. Preserve your Jewellery in the original box or in a soft cloth pouch.

VK Jewels ensures that all the information of product are accurate and complete. All dimensions are measured by hand, so there might be a very slight variation. Product colour may slightly vary due to photographic lighting sources or your monitor settings. Kindly go through the mentioned dimensions of the Product.
